commit message: Get API json and parse it
Remove SSL double verification and assume all SSL cert are valid loool
Use channel copy for image instead of a webview
Widget configure class, target version 10, compile on version 15
Display list of hackerspaces in Main
Use list for url, set spinner position with current api url
Use layout object instead of everything in main.xml
Link for status and space url
Separate intent-filter for Main, basic widget (update only every 30mn, need service)
Add button when Main is used as widget configuration, factorization, startService when widget is created
Make IntentService work (inner class is static)
Set to minimum update time (for now)
Update every 24h, going to use AlarmeManager for frequent update
According to doc better set update to 0 if using AlarmManager
Widget service using AlarmManager working nicely
Show status for hackerspace which doesnt provide icon for status
Cancel widget Alarm when is removed
Set alarm in onUpdate (so it works after reboot)
Support multiple widgets, better widget configure screen (without space information)
Dialog theme for configure widget, fix bug when nothing is selected manually in widget configure, put back interval of 15mn for widget update
Better default value for invalid widget id, click on the widget now open the particular hackerspace
Cancel current activity status when clicking on widget
Do not get api when widget is not yet configured (but #13755)
Horizontal aligne for image in widget
Handle configuration change with a Bundle saving JSON (not so good for memory though)
Much smaller bytebuffer (and much more performant)
